level.heading: Captive insurance regulatory and supervision trust account.
level.text: All fees, fines, penalties, and assessments received by the Commissioner under this chapter shall be deposited in, and credited to, the account established by § 31-1202(b-1), and expended in accordance with § 31-1202(b-1).

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 20 of Captive Insurance Company Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-640, November 30, 2004, 52 DCR 1238).
